Package javax.activity.coordination

Interface Summary
Action An Action is an entity that is registered with an interest in one or more SignalSets.
ServiceManager A ServiceManager is an entity that is provided by a UOW service that uses the Activity service; it is a factory for the UOW service's object and also specifies how the UOW service's Activities should be managed.
SignalSet A SignalSet is an entity that is provided by a UOW service built on top of the Activity service that produces Signals and understands the responses to those Signals.
